description: Master everyone's favourite salt and pepper squid with this easy recipe, then serve it up with a creamy garlic aioli as the perfect dipping sauce.
name: Salt & Pepper Squid Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut squid tubes into 1cm-thick rings, then place in a small bowl and cover with milk.
Combine flours and half of the salt flakes in a bowl.
Drain squid, then add to flour mixture and toss to coat. Stand for 10 minutes to help the flour mixture stick to squid.

Heat oil in a deep frying pan or wok over medium-high heat. Cook squid, in batches, for 45 seconds or until just starting to brown. Using a slotted spoon, remove squid from oil and drain on paper towels. Season with remaining salt flakes and pepper, then serve with garlic aioli and lemon wedges.
